mapper.select: select post_no postNo ,cate_no cateNo ,post_title postTitle ,post_content postContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from post where cate_no = #{cateNo}
select post_no postNo ,cate_no cateNo ,post_title postTitle ,post_content postContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from post where cate_no = #{cateNo} and post_title = #{postTitle}

select post_no postNo ,cate_no cateNo ,post_title postTitle ,post_content postContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from post where cate_no = (select max(cate_no) from category where id= #{id}) and post_no = (select max(post_no) from post where cate_no = (select max(cate_no) from category where id= #{id}))

select rn ,post_no postNo ,cate_no cateNo ,post_title postTitle ,post_content postContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from ( select rownum rn ,post_no ,cate_no ,post_title ,post_content ,reg_date from ( select post_no ,cate_no ,post_title ,post_content ,reg_date from post where cate_no = (select cate_no from category where id = #{id} and cate_no = #{cateNo}) order by post_no desc) ) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}

select post_no postNo ,cate_no cateNo ,post_title postTitle ,post_content postContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from post where cate_no = (select max(cate_no) cateNo from category where id= #{id})
select count(*) count from post where cate_no = (select cate_no from category where id = #{id} and cate_no = #{cateNo})
